Adult_Dosing.text:
Infections, bacterial:
250-500mg PO q12h x 10 days

Pediatric_Dosing.text:
infections, bacterial:
30mg/kg/day PO divided q12h x 10 days, max 1000mg/day

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: B
Lactation risk
: probably safe

Renal_Dosing.text:
Adult: CrCl < 30: decrease dose 50%
Pediatric:CrCl < 30: decrease dose 50%

Hepatic_Dosing.text:
Adult: none defined
Pediatric: none defined

Serious.text:
anaphylaxis
seizures
nephrotoxicity
leukopenia or thrombocytopenia
steven-johnson syndrome
c-diff associated diarrhea

Common.text:
nausea
diarrhea
vomiting
transaminitis
dizziness
rash
eosinophilia

Pharmacology.text:
Half-life: 1.3 h
Metabolism: hepatic
Excretion: unchanged in urine (61%)
